languages.text: Похоже, что гости церемонии пытались убить Фиделио, каковым считали Вольного Торговца. Следует вернуться к крематорию и потребовать ответа за эти действия.
It seems the ceremony guests were trying to kill Fidelio, whom they believed the Rogue Trader to be. The Lord Captain should return to the crematorium and demand answers for these actions.
languages.original_text: Похоже, что гости церемонии пытались убить Фиделио, каковым считали Вольного Торговца. Следует вернуться к крематорию и потребовать ответа за эти действия.

traits.locale_text: It seems the ceremony guests were trying to kill Fidelio, whom they believed the Rogue Trader to be. The Lord Captain should return to the crematorium and demand answers for these actions.
It seems the ceremony guests were trying to kill Fidelio, whom they believed the Rogue Trader to be. The Lord Captain should return to the crematorium and demand answers for these actions.
It seems the ceremony guests were trying to kill Fidelio, whom they believed the Rogue Trader to be. The Lord Captain should return to the crematorium and demand answers for these actions.
It seems the ceremony guests were trying to kill Fidelio, whom they believed the Rogue Trader to be. The Lord Captain should return to the crematorium and demand answers for these actions.

languages.text: 参加聚会的客人似乎打算杀害菲迪奥，而且他们误以为行商浪人就是菲迪奥。领主舰长应当返回火葬场，要求在场的客人对这样的行为进行解释。
languages.original_text: It seems the ceremony guests were trying to kill Fidelio, whom they believed the Rogue Trader to be. The Lord Captain should return to the crematorium and demand answers for these actions.

traits.locale_text: 参加聚会的客人似乎打算杀害菲迪奥，而且他们误以为行商浪人就是菲迪奥。领主舰长应当返回火葬场，要求在场的客人对这样的行为进行解释。

languages.text: どうやら式典の招待客たちは自由開拓者だと信じていたフィデリオを殺そうとしていたようだ。ロード・キャプテンは火葬場に戻り、この一連の出来事に対する答えを求める必要がある。
languages.original_text: It seems the ceremony guests were trying to kill Fidelio, whom they believed the Rogue Trader to be. The Lord Captain should return to the crematorium and demand answers for these actions.

traits.locale_text: どうやら式典の招待客たちは自由開拓者だと信じていたフィデリオを殺そうとしていたようだ。ロード・キャプテンは火葬場に戻り、この一連の出来事に対する答えを求める必要がある。

languages.text: Parece que los invitados estaban intentando matar a Fidelio, creyendo que era {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán debería volver al crematorio y exigir respuestas por estos actos.
languages.original_text: It seems the ceremony guests were trying to kill Fidelio, whom they believed the Rogue Trader to be. The Lord Captain should return to the crematorium and demand answers for these actions.

traits.locale_text: Parece que los invitados estaban intentando matar a Fidelio, creyendo que era {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán debería volver al crematorio y exigir respuestas por estos actos.

languages.text: Offenbar haben die Gäste der Zeremonie versucht, Fidelio zu töten, für den sie {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} hielten. Der Lord Captain sollte zum Krematorium zurückkehren und Antworten für ihr Handeln einfordern.
languages.original_text: It seems the ceremony guests were trying to kill Fidelio, whom they believed the Rogue Trader to be. The Lord Captain should return to the crematorium and demand answers for these actions.

traits.locale_text: Offenbar haben die Gäste der Zeremonie versucht, Fidelio zu töten, für den sie {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} hielten. Der Lord Captain sollte zum Krematorium zurückkehren und Antworten für ihr Handeln einfordern.

languages.text: Il semblerait que les participants à la cérémonie aient pris {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour Fidélio, qu'ils projetaient d'assassiner. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} devrait retourner au crématorium et demander des explications.
languages.original_text: It seems the ceremony guests were trying to kill Fidelio, whom they believed the Rogue Trader to be. The Lord Captain should return to the crematorium and demand answers for these actions.

traits.locale_text: Il semblerait que les participants à la cérémonie aient pris {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour Fidélio, qu'ils projetaient d'assassiner. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} devrait retourner au crématorium et demander des explications.

languages.text: Meğerse törendeki konuklar, Fidelio olduğunu sandıkları Hür Tacir'i öldürme niyetindelermiş. Lord Kaptan, krematoryuma dönüp bu yaptıklarının hesabını sormalı.
languages.original_text: It seems the ceremony guests were trying to kill Fidelio, whom they believed the Rogue Trader to be. The Lord Captain should return to the crematorium and demand answers for these actions.

traits.locale_text: Seremoni konuklarının, Hür Tacir olduğunu sandıkları Fidelio'yu öldürmeye çalıştıkları ortaya çıktı. Lord Kaptan krematoryuma dönmeli ve bu yaşananlara dair yanıtlar talep etmeli.
